extendedInfo.description: Explore the therapeutic meaning of your dreams and dream-like experiences.This is NOT a dream dictionary. Dream images mean different things to different people. Through an interactive process similar to working with a therapist or counselor, DREAM-e will guide you to find out the therapeutic meaning of these images for you.  Features:1. JOURNAL your dreams and interesting experiences2. ANALYZE your dreams with our interactive A.I.3. APPLY the wisdom of dreams to find meaning in your life, improve your relationships, become successful, etc. 4. Get a real-time PROFILE of your subconscious potential5. SHARE your interpretations with your friends and community on Facebook, Twitter or by e-mail6. Fully adaptive and learning A.I., becomes more knowledgeable the more you use it  This is NOT a dream dictionary. Dream images mean different things to different people. Through an interactive process similar to working with a therapist or counselor, DREAM-e will guide you to find out what these images mean to you.For Non-dreamers:If you don't remember your dreams, don't worry. Do you remember the last time you had an unusual experience that made you think 'I must be dreaming'? FThese happenings are significant, and Dream-e can guide you to explore them just it would do with night time dreams, in order to help you better connect with your inner self. Technology:Dream-e is the first product of a collaborative effort between former NASA engineers, psychologists, artists and developers in order to create a new kind of technology that taps into the subconscious in order to achieve mindfulness and receive inner guidance.The technology is highly sophisticated - despite the simple appearance - and it works with your creative mind. This could be a challenge because it involves using different parts of the brain than the ones used in day to day life.Just like learning to ride a bicycle, you will have to practice and probably fall a few times.Please read the help and watch the videos, this will dramatically improve your chances of success. http://www.technosophics.com/dream-e.htmlThe technology is new and still in development, so if you have any problems please contact us.Privacy:All your data is private and stored locally on your device. No information is being sent to us or to third parties.Thank you!Tags: dream, dreams, dream interpretation, dream analysis, mindfulness,consciousness, self-integration, self-discovery, dreamer, psychology, therapy

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: It feels like talking to a counsolor. And gives great advice!
reviews.author: Malayah McHenry

reviews.title: Fun bit of pseudo-psychology
reviews.comment: This is fun to play with but don\'t take it seriously. It has some flaws which point out the risks of trying to automate a psychotherapy process. For instance, I was testing it with various dreams from real counseling situations and it just told me that I should \"cultivate the quality of \'suicide\' whenever I need to deal with \'confidence\'\". A human would never make that kind of error in understanding.  Still, better than a dream dictionary. At least the makers understand that dreams are only what *you* make of them not what Jung or some blissed-out new ager thinks they mean.
reviews.author: Stuart Nolan

reviews.title: Nice setup
reviews.comment: That\'s it.   Told me that an old man providing me with books from other worlds meant I needed to throw something old away....
